root.name: BlockVars
root.description: This plugin library offers vars useful when working with Protocols. Examples are: – VarDimension: allows to specify an integer dimension. – VarPoint: allows to specify an integer point. – VarRectangle: allows to specify a rectangle with integer coordinates and dimensions. Also, different blocks have been made available to use this variables: – Define Point – Define Dimension – Define Rectangle (by point and dimension) – Define Rectangle 2 (by 4 integer properties)
root.author: danyfel80 – Daniel Felipe González Obando
